ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup unsalted butter or unsalted margarine
8 ounces semisweet chocolate chips, or bars, cut into bite-size chunks
4 teaspoons flour (or matzo meal, ground in a blender to a fine powder)
8 extra-large paper muffin cups (or use regular paper muffin cups, which will make 12 cakes)
1 (6 ounce) container raspberries, barely moistened and rolled in about
½ cup sugar right before serving

cookingTips: Melt chocolate and butter together over double boiler, never directly over heat
Whisk eggs and sugar to ribbon stage (pale and thick) for proper aeration
Chill batter for 20 minutes before baking, and bake just until edges are set but center is still soft
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through careful chocolate melting and proper egg whisking to achieve the signature molten center.
